title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: When using the "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective, the action is always enabled, even when it is not needed. This can lead to unnecessary manual builds. The expected behavior is that the "Build" action should only be enabled if a build is required. Currently, it is always enabled regardless of the build status.
OB: Currently, the "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when a build is required.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the Java perspective and right-click in the editor area to show the context sensitive popup menu. The "Build" action should be enabled regardless of whether a build is needed or not.
